section.p: You sail for days. Suddenly the ship surges forward, out of control! To your horror, a gigantic whirlpool appears in the middle of the ocean, sucking you down with relentless speed. Soon you are hurtling around on sheer walls of water. The sky is a small blue window that looks down at you through the towering columns of the sea!
‘We are being sucked into the land below the world by the Demons of the Deep!’ howls one of your men.
